article.title: A Statistical Analysis of Published Articles on Electrical and Power Engineering
article.author: Gorkova, V. I.Mellion, S. P.
article.text: A statistical analysis of articles published in electrical and power engineering serials and periodicals is given.. The results have been used to refine the quantitative formulation of the Zipf law.. The computational method used can serve as a prototype for analysis of abstract-journal-like publications..
